implementation_notes.description: CRYPTO frame encoding/decoding for TLS handshake transport (RFC 9000 ยง19.6)
new_functions: SocketQUICFrame_encode_crypto(uint64_t offset, const uint8_t *data, size_t len, uint8_t *out, size_t out_len)
